amendment.description: Amendment requires that NEXRAD radar sites operated by the Department of Defense function as fully committed elements of the national weather radar network.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, directing the Department of Defense and the NOAA Administrator to ensure that NEXRAD systems maintained by the DoD provide the same detection coverage as the national weather radar network.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
